dchrisum0lem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> sum_ m e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( ( x ^ 2 ) / m ) ) ) ( ( ( X ` ( L ` m ) ) / ( sqrt ` m ) ) / ( sqrt ` d ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
